body:
Well the bigger dick always win.
Now shougo get a rope, and you know what to do.
well, at least it doesn't seem to go the full on NTR route, with her getting impregnated and dumping the child on Shougo.

oof, seriously.... i like this series, and the art is fantastic, but ouch, the story hurts my soul and is making me kinda mad.

Poor fucking Shougo.
Looking at the last line it seems like they break up. It says she is the ex girlfriend. Well its shitty that it had to end so poorly for shougo.
one thing i learn from this series.... when you do girlfriend swap, make sure to have more libido than your friend... else this happens
wow,, there's still a sequel, the author sure damn loves this series,, seriously hott,
